title: Drawing, "Anne Wrigley Yacht: Stateroom", October 13, 1934
medium: Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamp in black ink, lower right: DONALD DESKEY/501 MADISON AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite in stamp: Job. 524/ 3/4"-1'0/Olsson/ 10/13/34, 10/20/34, OFFICE; inscibed in graphite, lower center: YACHT - STATEROOM/DECORATOR ANNE WRIGLEY/SCALE 3/4"-1'0; dimensions and instructions in graphite
description: Plan and elevations for stateroom of Anne Wrigley's yacht. Entrance to room on south wall near left. Bed in corner, lower right. Another bed placed in opposite corner, upper right; night stand between beds with reflector above and light behind each bed. Vanity in upper left corner with rounded front right edge; cabinet at left, three stacked drawers at right. Circular vanity stool on tubular pedestal in front of vanity. Full-length mirror to left of vanity with long vertical light to left of mirror. Rectangular rug beneath vanity and stool. Door to bathroom in center of west wall. Built-in closet to left of bathroom door.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Anne Wrigley Yacht: Stateroom", October 13, 1934. Graphite on tracing paper, double ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-553.
